categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic starships

nodes.text: The Geist was a Mon Calamari cruiser captained by General Hera Syndulla. It was present at the Mako-Ta Space Docks when it was attacked by the Galactic Empire. It was one of the few cruisers to escape the attack.
"Geist" is the German word for "Ghost," which was the name of Hera Syndulla's own VCX-100 light freighter in the Star Wars Rebels animated TV series.
